sqlMap.select: select distinct em.entity_id as entityId,em.entity_name as entityName, em.entity_code as entityCode from entity_master em,program_offered_by pob where pob.offered_by=em.entity_id AND em.entity_id LIKE #universityCode#;

SELECT stt.component_code as reportCode,stt.component_description as reportDescription, stt1.component_code as reportTypeCode,stt1.component_description as reportTypeDescription,ra.user_role_id as roleId, generate_authority as generateAuthority,download_authority as downloadAuthority FROM system_table_two stt,report_authority ra,user_info ui,system_table_two stt1 WHERE stt.group_code='RPORTS' and ra.report_code=stt.component_code and ui.user_id=#userId# and ui.application=#application# and ui.user_group_id=ra.user_role_id and stt1.group_code='REPTYP' AND stt.dummy_flag_two IS NULL and stt.dummy_flag_three=stt1.component_code order by cast(ra.report_code as signed);

SELECT pm.program_name programName,pm.program_id programId,pm.program_code programCode,sys.component_code branchId,sys.component_description branchName, sys1.component_code specializationId,sys1.component_description specializationName, sys2.component_code semesterCode,sys2.component_description semesterName,pr.semester_start_date semesterStartDate,pr.semester_end_date semesterEndDate from program_registration pr,program_master pm, system_table_two sys,system_table_two sys1,system_table_two sys2,program_course_header pch where pr.entity_id=#entityId# AND pr.program_course_key=pch.program_course_key AND pch.program_id=pm.program_id AND pch.branch_id=sys.component_code AND pch.specialization_id=sys1.component_code AND pch.semester_code=sys2.component_code AND sys.group_code='BRNCOD' AND sys1.group_code='SPCLCD' AND sys2.group_code='SEMCOD' AND sys.university_code=sys1.university_code AND sys1.university_code=sys2.university_code AND sys2.university_code=pr.university_id AND pr.university_id=#universityCode# AND session_start_date=#passedFromSession# AND session_end_date=#passedToSession# AND status='ACT' order by pm.program_id;

select * from (SELECT distinct pm.program_name programName,pm.program_code programCode,pm.program_id programId FROM program_registration pr,program_master pm,program_course_header pch where pr.entity_id=#entityId# AND pr.session_start_date=#passedFromSession# AND pr.session_end_date=#passedToSession# AND pr.status='ACT' AND pch.program_course_key=pr.program_course_key AND pch.program_id=pm.program_id)set1 join (select ('Even Semesters') as semesterName union select ('Odd Semesters'))set2 ;

SELECT distinct pm.program_name programName,pm.program_code programCode,pm.program_id programId,pm.print_aggregate semesterName FROM program_registration pr,program_master pm,program_course_header pch where pr.entity_id=#entityId# AND pr.session_start_date=#passedFromSession# AND pr.session_end_date=#passedToSession# AND pr.status='ACT' AND pch.program_course_key=pr.program_course_key AND pch.program_id=pm.program_id;

SELECT distinct pm.program_name programName,pm.program_id programId,pm.program_code programCode, sys2.component_code semesterCode,sys2.component_description semesterName,pr.semester_start_date semesterStartDate,pr.semester_end_date semesterEndDate ,ptd.final_semester_code as finalSemCode, ptd.semester_sequence AS semesterSequence from program_registration pr,program_master pm, system_table_two sys2,program_course_header pch,program_term_details ptd where pr.entity_id=#entityId# AND pch.semester_code=ptd.semester_code AND pch.program_id=ptd.program_id AND pr.program_course_key=pch.program_course_key AND pch.program_id=pm.program_id AND pch.semester_code=sys2.component_code AND sys2.group_code='SEMCOD' AND sys2.university_code=pr.university_id AND pr.university_id=#universityCode# AND session_start_date=#passedFromSession# AND session_end_date=#passedToSession# AND status='ACT' order by pm.program_id,sys2.component_code;

SELECT distinct pm.program_name programName,pm.program_id programId,pm.program_code programCode,sys.component_code branchId,sys.component_description branchName, sys1.component_code specializationId,sys1.component_description specializationName from program_registration pr,program_master pm, system_table_two sys,system_table_two sys1,program_course_header pch where pr.entity_id=#entityId# AND pr.program_course_key=pch.program_course_key AND pch.program_id=pm.program_id AND pch.branch_id=sys.component_code AND pch.specialization_id=sys1.component_code AND sys.group_code='BRNCOD' AND sys1.group_code='SPCLCD' AND sys.university_code=sys1.university_code AND sys1.university_code=pr.university_id AND pr.university_id=#universityCode# AND session_start_date=#passedFromSession# AND session_end_date=#passedToSession# AND status='ACT' order by pm.program_id;
sqlMap.insert: insert into report_control_log (university_code, entity_id, program_id, branch_code, specialization_code, semester_code, semester_start_date, semester_end_date, report_code, report_generated, report_printed, session_start_date, session_end_date, insert_time, creator_id,semester_type) values(#universityCode#,#entityId#,#programId#,#branchId#,#specializationId#, #semesterCode#,#semesterStartDate#,#semesterEndDate#, #reportCode#,1,'No',#passedFromSession#,#passedToSession#,now(),#userId#,#programPrintType#);
sqlMap.select: select report_generated as reportGenerated,report_printed as printStatus from report_control_log where entity_id=#entityId# AND program_id=#programId# AND session_start_date=#passedFromSession# AND session_end_date=#passedToSession# AND semester_type=#programPrintType# AND report_code=#reportCode#;

select report_generated as reportGenerated,report_printed as printStatus from report_control_log where entity_id=#entityId# AND program_id=#programId# AND session_start_date=#passedFromSession# AND session_end_date=#passedToSession# AND report_code=#reportCode#;

select report_generated as reportGenerated,report_printed as printStatus from report_control_log where entity_id=#entityId# AND program_id=#programId# AND branch_code=#branchId# AND specialization_code=#specializationId# AND semester_code=#semesterCode# AND semester_start_date=#semesterStartDate# AND semester_end_date=#semesterEndDate# AND session_start_date=#passedFromSession# AND session_end_date=#passedToSession# AND report_code=#reportCode# ;

select report_generated as reportGenerated,report_printed as printStatus from report_control_log where entity_id=#entityId# AND program_id=#programId# AND session_start_date=#passedFromSession# AND session_end_date=#passedToSession# AND report_code=#reportCode# AND semester_code=#semesterCode# AND semester_start_date=#semesterStartDate# AND semester_end_date=#semesterEndDate#;

select report_generated as reportGenerated,report_printed as printStatus from report_control_log where entity_id=#entityId# AND program_id=#programId# AND session_start_date=#passedFromSession# AND session_end_date=#passedToSession# AND report_code=#reportCode# AND branch_code=#branchId# AND specialization_code=#specializationId#;

SELECT stt.component_code as reportCode,stt.component_description as reportDescription, stt1.component_code as reportTypeCode,stt1.component_description as reportTypeDescription,ra.user_role_id as roleId, generate_authority as generateAuthority,download_authority as downloadAuthority FROM system_table_two stt,report_authority ra,user_info ui,system_table_two stt1 WHERE stt.group_code='RPORTS' and ra.report_code=stt.component_code and ui.user_id=#userId# and ui.user_group_id=ra.user_role_id and stt1.group_code='REPTYP' AND stt.dummy_flag_two='GN' and stt.dummy_flag_three=stt1.component_code order by cast(ra.report_code as signed);
select course_code courseCode,course_name courseName from course_master;

SELECT component_description as reportDescription,component_code as reportCode,t.generate_authority as generateAuthority,t.download_authority as downloadAuthority FROM system_table_two stt LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM report_authority ra where ra.user_role_id=#userRoleId# and ra.university_code=#universityCode#)t on stt.component_code=t.report_code where stt.group_code='RPORTS' and stt.university_code=#universityCode# order by cast(stt.component_code as signed);
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM report_authority WHERE report_code=#deleteReportCode# AND university_code=#universityCode# AND user_role_id=#userRoleId#;
sqlMap.select: select company_name as companyName,request_date as reqDate from report_verification order by reqDate;
